title: Hemant Lamba resigns as Infosys Executive VP
description: In his resignation letter marked to Infosys CEO Salil Parekh, Lamba wrote: "I am writing to inform you of my decision to resign from the services of Infosys. I am thankful for the opportunity and experiences I have had over the years".
content: Infosys on Friday said Hemant Lamba, Executive Vice President and Global Head of Strategic Sales, has resigned from the company. The Bengaluru-headquartered IT services firm informed about the resignation of the Senior Management Personnel in a statutory filing. "This is to inform that Hemant Lamba, Senior Management Personnel, has resigned from the services of the company," Infosys said in a BSE filing.
